Translation: I have seen it as good, except for those people that we meet and we deal with them. You may find the truth in what they say or the rumor or what they say but I don't see a problem with it.

Transcription: Badde nnungi. Nga nkuzeeko bulungi, tebabadde na buti bubonabona.

Transcription: Lwakuba mulimu omu gwe baaleesemu ate alabika kuba nze wano nduddewo, alabye nga simula. Transcription: Bankoledde eri mu youth department. Ne bamala ne basindika eno wansi okulaba doctor. Naye doctor alabye mu hard school. Hmm. Hard. Ne bamala nankolako forcefully. Ne basindika wano ku gundi wa okufuna eddagala then enzira eri ba eri bankozeeko mu ggwaaggulu. Then ne bamumaliriza.

Transcription: Nkeberebwa. Naye eddagala lyonna lyonna ba ng'ambye lyakugula ate era nga nnina ne doctor gwe ntuuseeko nandaga nti no test gye ba like mu government test y'ebadde neetaagisibwa okunzujako mu government tegibawa ate nandaga nti aginzujeko ate n'ansaba sente kati awo si kitegeera. Transcription: N'endowooza omwaana nga mulwadde. Hmm. Era ne bamukolako bamuwadde eddagala. Hmm. Bamukozeeko bulungi tewali buzibu.
Translation: I think the child is sick. Hmm. And they worked on them, they gave them medication. Hmm. They worked on them well, no problem.

Transcription: Twaze wano ku makya twagala immunizations ssaawa bbiri ez’okumakya twadde tutuuse ssaawa zino musanvu tewali musawo yatuuse.
Translation: We came here in the morning to seek immunization at eight o'clock in the morning and by seven o'clock no doctor had arrived.
